segments.text: I observe the kitchen in this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman dries a plate at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands unaware, one foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy climbs a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches into the open cookie jar cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby extends her hand toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She waits patiently for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR
